data.name: ReThink 4
data.detailed_description:
ReThink 4 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors.
Use new gameplay mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

Features:

  • 60 new Puzzles
  • New Gameplay-Features
  • Old Features are reintroduced
  • More balanced difficulty
  • Many smaller changes and improvements

Improvements and Additions over ReThink 4:

  • Gameplay:
    ReThink 4 primarily focuses on improving the gameplay with new features and the reintroduction of features from previous games.

    In direct comparison to ReThink 3, one Cube has been removed, while multiple new Features have been added.
    Aside from the new features, selected features from older games have been reintegrated into the game.
    The game is 50% larger than previous games, while also featuring a more balanced difficulty in comparison to ReThink 3.

    The game also features the larger maps again, based on the Feedback from ReThink 3.

  • Improved Visuals:
    While the improvement of the games graphics was not the focus of this game, there have been many changes and additions.

    Some of these changes are more obvious and have been made to aid the changes made to the gameplay, while others are less obvious, like: Overall quality improvements of existing Assets, and the addition of new Assets for a variety of things in the game.

data.short_description: ReThink 4 is a Puzzle Game in a futuristic setting, that features a variety of Puzzles that utilize Lasers and the behavior of light and it's colors. Use new gameplay mechanics to puzzle your way through the game's beautiful world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Phenom / Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280X / nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 / Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 290 / nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5500 MB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
